subject: Stop e-mailing me privately with your questions
msgSnippet: Everyone: Please stop e-mailing me privately with your general questions about JUnit. I am a paid consultant. I don t mind giving out free information to the
messageBody:
Everyone:

Please stop e-mailing me privately with your general questions about JUnit. I am a paid consultant. I don't mind giving out free information to the group, because there is no pressure on *specifically me* to provide answers; however, I don't think it's right to ask people you don't know for free professional advice.

If you have a question about JUnit, please ask the group. If I have time, I will answer it; but I will not answer private questions from people I do not know. For that, I expect to be paid.

It's just a matter of professional courtesy. Thank you for your time.


J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
Let's write software that people understand.
http://www.diasparsoftware.com/
telephone: +1 416 791-8603
